text: allāhanu pavitra bhavana ka'aba:Vannu mānavara āśraya dhāmavāgisiruvanu. Hāgeyē, pavitra tiṅgaḷugaḷu, baliprāṇi mattu koraḷapaṭṭiyiruva (harakeya) prāṇigaḷu (avana saṅkētagaḷāgive). Ākāśagaḷalli mattu bhūmiyalliruva ellavannū allāhanu ballanu mattu allāhanu pratiyondu viṣayada jñāna uḷḷavanu embudu nimage tiḷidirabēkendu (idannellā nimage vivarisalāguttide)
